speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I regrettably missed rollcall votes 236-244. Had I been present, I would have voted in the following manner: Rollcall No. 236: "no"; rollcall No. 237: "no"; rollcall No. 238: "no"; rollcall No. 239: "no"; rollcall No. 240: "no"; rollcall No. 241: "no"; rollcall No. 242: "no"; rollcall No. 243: "no"; rollcall No. 244: "yea".
